string-array.name: credits
string-array.item: Brice Seibert - designed the easy mode and… something secret ;)
Vukašin Anđelković - designed the extreme mode and the app icon
Radek Bledowski - designed the medium mode
Corbin Crutchley - did… more secret things :)
Anas Khan - inspiration for the rocket
Justin Kruit - inspired the color scheme
